description.en:
SCC is the all-purpose coin when it comes to staking, masternode hosting, exchange and mining.
The coin supports various functions in the in-house POS pool with over 20 different coins and various shared masternodes and private masternodes.
1 year POW and POS, then pure POS with a ROI of ~100% p.a.
A coin can hardly offer more usecases.
Again: MN hosting, Exchange, Mining contracts, Premium Memberships and much more is already or will be available soon!
